Note: Please scan this QR code to add Player

This service allows user to switch between Digital Signage and TV input with your android TV box remote control. Only Switch on this service if you are using TV box with extra hdmi input like Zidoo box, do not switch on this service in your mobiles. Note: We do not read any of your input data like credit card details or bank details and we do not share any of your data to any third party applications.
Dear User, Campaign is already exist.\nWould you like to Override it?
Dear User,\nAre you sure to Logout?
